structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - USE OF SANITARY SEWER SYSTEM [4]

text.section: The POTW Director may require the user to submit such information as may be deemed necessary to evaluate the changed condition, including the submission of a waste water discharge permit application under ยง8-2127 of this article.

The POTW Director may issue a waste water discharge permit under ยง8-2127 of this article or modify an existing waste water discharge permit under ยง8-2127 of this article in response to changed conditions or anticipated changed conditions.

For purposes of this requirement, significant changes include, but are not limited to, flow or pollutant increases of twenty (20) per cent or greater, and the discharge of any previously unreported pollutants. (Ord. No. 2011-981, ยง1, 12-6-11)
